prompt: Deploy nginx with 2 replicas
expected:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx"}
actual:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx"}

prompt: Create a deployment named myapp using almas07/hello-llm:latest with 3 replicas
expected:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: myapp
        image: almas07/hello-llm:latest"}

{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
spec:
  replicas: 3

      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:

prompt: Scale demo-app to 3 replicas
Scale nginx-deploy to 5 replicas
Enable autoscaling for myapp from 2 to 6 replicas at 70% CPU
Autoscale based on current cpu usage for backend
Optimize latency for payment-service
Optimize latency for unique-app-demo
Analyze metrics for myapp in default namespace
Show CPU and memory usage for nginx-deploy
Analyze CPU usage over time for unique-app-demo
Expose deployment myapp via a LoadBalancer service on port 80
actual:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: myapp-service
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
  - port: 80
  selector:
    app: myapp"}

prompt: Provide YAML for a service exposing nginx on port 80
expected:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nginx-service
spec:
  selector:
    app: nginx
  ports:
  - protocol: TCP
    port: 80
    targetPort: 80
  type: LoadBalancer"}
actual:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nginx-service
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  selector:
    app: nginx
  ports:
  - protocol: TCP
    port: 80
    targetPort: 80"}

prompt: Deploy an app named multi-step-demo using nginx image and then expose it and enable autoscaling
expected:
[{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: multi-step-demo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: multi-step-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: multi-step-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: multi-step-demo
        image: nginx"}, {"type": "cli", "content": "kubectl expose deployment multi-step-demo --type=LoadBalancer --port=80 --target-port=80"}, {"type": "autoscale", "name": "multi-step-demo", "min_replicas": 1, "max_replicas": 5, "target_cpu": 60}]
actual:
[{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: multi-step-demo
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: multi-step-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: multi-step-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx

{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: apps/v1

      app: 123-invalid-name
  template:
    metadata:

        app: 123-invalid-name
    spec:
      containers:

        image: nginx"}

prompt: Deploy an app with no image specified (should request clarification)
expected: {"type": "clarify", "missing": "image", "hint": "Please specify the Docker image name (e.g., username/repo:tag)."}
actual: {"type": "cli", "content": "Please specify the image for the deployment."}

prompt: Create a cronjob that runs echo hello every minute
expected:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: echo-hello
spec:
  schedule: "* * * * *"
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: echo
            image: busybox
            args:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - echo hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure"}
actual:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: batch/v1beta1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: echo-hello
spec:
  schedule: "* * * * *"
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: echo
            image: busybox
            args:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - echo hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure"}

prompt: Provide YAML for a ConfigMap storing app settings
expected:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: app-settings
data:
  key: value
  LOG_LEVEL: info"}
actual:
{"type": "yaml", "content": "apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: app-settings
data:
  setting1: value1
  setting2: value2"}
